subject: Thinque Acceptance Email
content:
Andrey , Attached is the PQA and the User Interface document ( DDS ) that we talked about in our conversation tonight . <s> This application is still running on a test server and in order to move to production we need you to confirm that everything is working properly . <s> Please review the application and reply to this email giving us official acceptance of the application . <s> After acceptance we will get this application on a production server . <s> You will get production support , full development fees are due and hosting billing starts . <s> Please keep in mind the scope of this project . <s> For purposes of this application as a selling tool , we have identified # pages which can match all the forms . <s> I have attached those HTML pages . <s> If we get other formats outside of these forms our application may fail . <s> We understand that there can be several types of forms depending on how each of your customers want to customize each form making this a very flexible application . <s> On a forward going basis , as Thinque gains new clients through this wireless selling tool we will build new requirements based on the customizability of each application to ensure successful wireless application deployment . <s> The usernames and passwords that work with this application are : 
 ep1 , ep1 
 ep2 , ep2 
 ep3 , ep3 <s> What we need from Thinque 
 # . <s> small icon for the PQA ----Darshan <s> what is the size of that ? <s> D , 
 Also , with regards to the html pages that we identified for the forms . <s> They are not attached but will be included when I send this email . <s> The people receiving this email at thinque will be Andrey - lead developer and did all the feedback , Jerry Mendes - Biz Dev and now heads up Professional Svcs , and Nyu Ning - I believe she s the VP $ CTO . 
 <s> In any event , who do we get sign off from ? <s> Personally , Andrey knows the wireless app best and the web site , plus he did all the feedback . <s> Please advise . <s> I got ta bounce for a few but will be back send me your feedback <s> and I will get this moving forward .

subject: Affiliate Agreement - Payment provision
content:
Susan , I know you 've been swamped and probably have n't had a chance to get to my earlier email about the affiliate agreement . <s> I need your help in reviewing section # , payment , to see if it works for your a $ p schedule . <s> I 've embedded the provision below . <s> Let me know if there is an easier payment schedule from a workflow standpoint than the one contained in the provision . <s> Thanks , 
 Trish Payment . <s> AvocadoIT will pay Company a commission equal to ten percent ( # % ) of net revenue actually received by AvocadoIT during the first year of AvocadoIT 's agreement with Customer to provide the AvocadoIT Rendering Solution . <s> AvocadoIT may change the amount or structure of commissions on one ( # ) month 's written notice . <s> AvocadoIT will pay commissions by check payable to Company within ninety ( # ) days after the end of the calendar month in which the commissions are earned . <s> Commissions totaling less than fifty dollars ( $ # ) for a calendar month will be aggregated until a minimum of fifty dollars ( $ # ) has been earned and paid within ninety ( # ) days after the end of the calendar month in which commissions reach fifty dollars ( $ # ) . <s> If this Agreement is terminated , AvocadoIT will pay any remaining commissions within ninety ( # ) days after the end of the calendar month in which the termination occurred .

subject: Venktesh Shukla - Bio and Photographs for Speaker Siliconindia
content:
As per your request for bio and photos : Venktesh Shukla , CEO of AvocadoIT 
 An entrepreneur and veteran of two previous start up ventures , 
 Venk brings # years of sales , marketing and general 
 management experience to avocadoit , and a proven track 
 record of leading companies through rapid growth . <s> He was 
 previously Vice President in charge of the Ambit group of 
 Cadence Design Systems , a $ # billion electronic design 
 automation leader . <s> Prior to acquisition by Cadence , he was Vice 
 President of Marketing for Ambit Design Systems . <s> At Systems & 
 Networks , a network planning software company , he was Vice 
 President of Marketing and Sales . <s> Venk started his career in Civil 
 Service in India where he was the Under Secretary to the 
 federal government of India . <s> He holds a Masters in Management 
 from MIT 's Sloan School of Management in Cambridge , Massachusetts . <s> Photographs 
 We would like to use this one : <s> But if the one above is not workable , then use this one : Please contact me if you have any questions . 
 <s> Thank you .

subject: XML based config file
content:
Here is what Nihar and I discussed today .... <s> My recommendation on this : 
 Writing out to an XML - based config file from the ERT is not an issue . <s> Maintaining that file will be an issue if it has to be written out by the ERT . <s> For example , it has to be updated if the appId is deleted , or the page is deleted , or if the entire project is deleted , or if a page is renamed , etc .. <s> The Admin tool has to do it anyway , whether it is for db to db copy ( which it currently does ) , or for db to file ( a future goal as described in C below ) , it should copy the config file at the destination . <s> Why not simply extend the functionality to also allow a create - so that the user can build a config file which is based on the most recent state , and is not stale ? <s> A couple of issues to consider : 
 1 ) The appID in the db is not automatically deleted if the project or page in the db is deleted . <s> This was the requirement at that time . 
 <s> 2 ) How would the Admin tool know what to create if we also decide to allow copy of File System to File System ? <s> Thanks 
 -Tony

subject: New Phone System
content:
Good Afternoon All , I am happy to report that Phase II of the new telephone system installation is complete ! <s> Now , what does that mean ? <s> Well , it means that The new main telephone number for avocadoit has been officially changed to ( # ) # $ # . <s> From now on , you can give this number out if you wish your caller to reach you through the main switchboard . <s> The old main number has been re - routed to this new number so anyone who calls the old number will reach the new telephone system . <s> Additionally , each of you has your own direct dial number which is listed on your new telephone . <s> Your old telephone will be disconnected and removed from your desk by # p.m. on Friday . <s> If you have saved any voicemail on your old telephone , you will no longer have access to the messages after Friday . <s> So please listen to any saved messages and write any important information down . <s> By the way , your direct dial number is now listed in the global address list in Outlook ( along with everyone else 's , in case you are looking ) . <s> Your new telephone now has a voicemail account set up . <s> PLEASE be aware that this new voicemail system is part of a unified messaging system that will be more fully implemented in Phase III , but is partially installed now . <s> Effective immediately , all of your messages , BOTH voicemail AND email , are stored in your Outlook Inbox , and can be accessed BOTH from your telephone AND Outlook email inbox . <s> Voicemail messages will show up in your email box with a .wav file attachment . <s> At this time , you will probably not be able to open the file in email , but over the next week we hope to install the unified messaging software on your computer ( and speakers , if you do n't already have them ) , and then you will be able to play your voicemails on your computer ! <s> One issue that Mark Stewart , our phone installation specialist , has brought to my attention pertains to the number of saved messages that your voicemail box says you have . <s> This number reflects all voice and e - mail messages ( and fax messages in the future ) in your Outlook email inbox at the time you check your mail . <s> To minimize this number you should create a subfolder in your inbox and move old messages to there . <s> You may even create multiple folders for some organization . BEWARE . <s> If you delete these messages using the phone mail system , they will be deleted from your inbox . <s> Do n't worry however . <s> They will still be in your Deleted folder . <s> If you need help figuring out any of this , please call Jennifer and she will walk you through it . <s> To personalize your voicemail and to set it up for access only by you , please go through the self - guided set up procedure as follows : 1 ) Press the ' Voice Mail ' button on your phone 
 2 ) Follow the instructions given by the nice voicemail lady 
 3 ) Your temporary password is # 
 # ) When asked , you will need to enter a new password of your choice . <s> This will need to be NUMBERS only and AT LEAST # digits , and can not begin with a ' # ' 
 5 ) Instruction cards will be provided in a few minutes . <s> If you have any technical difficulties setting up your voicemail , please send Mark Stewart an email describing the problem . <s> His troubleshooting team will get back to you tomorrow to help solve the problem . <s> If you absolutely ca n't wait until tomorrow , Jennifer or I may be able to help you . <s> The main fax number is still ( # ) # $ # , but will be changing in the next few days . <s> I will let you know when the new fax # goes live . <s> Thanks again for your patience during this phone system transition . <s> I hope you are aware of how much time and effort Mark Stewart , Phil Gonzales and Richard Yoza have put into this process . <s> We should all be sure to thank them when we see them .

subject: installer has # options for adapter type - should there be #
content:
This is unresolved . <s> Having all three is the safer option for now . <s> The reason this is unresolved is : 
 ActiveX works , but may require Thin Client , which is an issue for Japan . <s> We 're implementing a serialized COM adapter just in case we need it . <s> It is n't clear ( yet ) that the COM adapter will be usable . <s> # % chance we 'll ship the COM adapter , <s> # % chance it wo n't be shippable .

subject: Andy Seybold on AvocadoIT
content:
Comment : 
 ' often too much emphasis placed on converting existing Web pages for handheld devices and not enough thought given to better navigation paths ... <s> This type of navigation needs to be added because it is not usually available on the normal Web pages . <s> ' Response : 
 Good point . <s> That 's how you differentiate between a new kid on the block from a mature enterprise product $ ASP company that 
 delivers quality apps . <s> At AvocadoIT , having gone through this evolving process I can say that it takes some product maturity 
 to reach a point when one can develop excellent UI for wireless applications . <s> The goal at EP is to deliver the very best UI for a 
 given app - this at times requires us to follow a different navigation path than the one on the Web site , present data from multiple 
 html pages into one screen etc . <s> The planned product support of cookies ( the thing Ron in pointing at ) and user persistent data 
 will further enhance this capability . Rajeev

subject: UpShot case study - status
content:
FYI - UpShot is still in the process of identifying which customers are using their wireless service offering and have not even begun writing the case studies -- this explains Paul 's ( UpShot ) lack of response . <s> Paul could not even give an estimated timeline for completion . <s> i proposed to Paul that we want to write a case study on UpShot that includes a piece on UpShot 's customers using the service ( we would leverage UpShot 's case study for this piece ) . <s> That said , i see we have two options : - move forward with an UpShot case study in which we interview Malcolm Webb and then add the UpShot customer piece in at a later time . 
 <s> - wait until UpShot begins working on / completes their case study and then interview Malcolm and weave the # pieces together into our own case study . <s> not sure which approach makes more sense from the point of view of our writer . <s> ( btw , who should write it -- Doni or Ron ? ) <s> what is the urgency for the UpShot case study ? <s> i think we can afford to wait while we still have America West and E*TRADE case studies in the pipe .

content:
Hi Jaime , Ok $ just heard back from Darshan .. see his update below .. <s> Darshan : Please do send Jaime ( et all @GoAmerica ) the necessary pqa when you have it ready . <s> Thanks , 
 Toni --- 
 We rolled out the updated Salesforce application last night . <s> GoAmerica will not be able to access the application with the current PQA they have . <s> We are still confirming a couple of items with Salesforce right now , after that we will be sending them the new PQA . <s> We can send a copy to GoAmerica right after we send it to Salesforce . <s> Can you pass this information on to GoAmerica for me ?
